title: gift send problem
body: Hey I just wanna ask the system shows me that i have too much pr so i cannot send my friends gift. This email shows i'm not a robot. Please reply or deal with the problem for me. Thanks

replies.body: I checked this out, but wasn't able to see anything out of the ordinary.  If you're still experiencing the notification, please reach out to our [Player Support Team](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and attach any screenshots or additional information to help with this.
Can you post a screenshot of the error message?
